channel.title: Need help fixing these 2 problems
channel.description:
I made a video showing what i need help with 1. Adding my custom item "Kiln Cape" to my client. 2. Making "Home" teleport in the modern spell book, actually teleport when i click the location.
Video explaining what I need help with : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rk_XsBJrrh4

item.title: Need help fixing these 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

You can’t offer rewards on these forums. Just post your custom item and an item that was already there so i can see… can’t be that hard man!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing these 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Kjloveday Kjloveday
item.description:
@Kjloveday wrote:

Bro im trying but i think the models are having a hard time loading from the raw file? can you help me, ill pay you $5 paypal, or even a few mill in 07 if you can help me add 2 items. kiln Cape + Steadfast or Prim boots.

Add me on skype if you want kenny.loveday

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing these 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Ok for the description value error you just need to add “blahblah”.getBytes();

For the other variables, it just means that there is no such variable of that name. For that just look at the custom items that are there and rename the capes variables with them and that should work. Post some code if you have too.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing these 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Kjloveday Kjloveday
item.description:
@Kjloveday wrote:

Ok so i followed the post, for adding the kiln cape, now how do i spawn item “19111” when i try to spawn it, it says “item doesn’t exist.”

“Modify post”

Ya i see that it wouldn’t compile the client, when i try to compile it gives me this error

Gyazo

Gyazo

More specific
